mapper.sql:
t.uuid uuid, t.qyid qyid,
t.qyjj qyjj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.src src
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_QY_JS t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM CFPA_QY_JS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_JS(uuid,qyid,qyjj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,src) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qyjj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_QY_JS t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_JS(uuid,qyid,qyjj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,src) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.qyjj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyjj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.src,jdbcType=VARCHAR} src
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), qyid = VALUES(qyid), qyjj = VALUES(qyjj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), src = VALUES(src)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_QY_JS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
